title: Skilled-Recognised Graduate visa (subclass 476)
raw_text: ===== main placeholder ========================================== ​This visa is closed to new applications. Skilled-Recognised Graduate visa (subclass 476) Page Content You can no longer apply for a Skilled – Recognised Graduate visa (subclass 476). A cap was placed on this visa on 22 December 2023, and it was permanently closed to new applications from 1 July 2024. Visa holders Details This information is for people who have already been granted a Skilled – Recognised Graduate visa (subclass 476). It explains your rights and obligations. You can use Visa Entitlement Verification Online (VEVO) for free to check your visa details and entitlements. How long your visa lasts Details If you already hold a Skilled – Recognised Graduate visa (subclass 476), it will be valid until the expiry date you were given when your visa was granted. What this visa lets you do Details With this visa, you can: live, study and work in Australia temporarily travel in and out of Australia any number of times as long as the visa is valid. Your obligations Details You and your family must comply with all visa conditions and Australian laws. During your stay in Australia, you must: maintain adequate health insurance while you are in Australia continue to meet the requirements under which you were granted the visa leave Australia when your visa ends (unless you are granted another visa). Family members Details No subsequent entrant applications can be lodged from 1 July 2024. Report changes in circumstances Details Tell us if your circumstances change. This includes a new residential address, a new passport, or a pregnancy, birth or death in your family. For further information, visit Changes in your situation

​This visa is closed to new applications.

​This visa is closed to new applications.

# Skilled-Recognised Graduate visa (subclass 476)

Skilled-Recognised Graduate visa (subclass 476)
Page Content

​

​

You can no longer apply for a Skilled – Recognised Graduate visa (subclass 476). A cap was placed on this visa on 22 December 2023, and it was permanently closed to new applications from 1 July 2024.

You can no longer apply for a Skilled – Recognised Graduate visa (subclass 476). A cap was placed on this visa on 22 December 2023, and it was permanently closed to new applications from 1 July 2024.
​

## Visa holders

Visa holders
Details

This information is for people who have already been granted a Skilled – Recognised Graduate visa (subclass 476). It explains your rights and obligations.

This information is for people who have already been granted a Skilled – Recognised Graduate visa (subclass 476). It explains your rights and obligations.

You can useVisa Entitlement Verification Online (VEVO)for free to check your visa details and entitlements.

You can use
Visa Entitlement Verification Online (VEVO)
for free to check your visa details and entitlements.

## How long your visa lasts

How long your visa lasts
Details

If you already hold a Skilled – Recognised Graduate visa (subclass 476), it will be valid until the expiry date you were given when your visa was granted.

If you already hold a Skilled – Recognised Graduate visa (subclass 476), it will be valid until the expiry date you were given when your visa was granted.

## What this visa lets you do

What this visa lets you do
Details

With this visa, you can:

With this visa, you can:
- live, study and work in Australia temporarily
live, study and work in Australia temporarily
- travel in and out of Australia any number of times as long as the visa is valid.
travel in and out of Australia any number of times as long as the visa is valid.

## Your obligations

Your obligations
Details

You and your family must comply with all visa conditions and Australian laws.

You and your family must comply with all visa conditions and Australian laws.

During your stay in Australia, you must:

During your stay in Australia, you must:
- maintain adequate health insurance while you are in Australia
maintain adequate health insurance while you are in Australia
- continue to meet the requirements under which you were granted the visa
continue to meet the requirements under which you were granted the visa
- leave Australia when your visa ends (unless you are granted another visa).
leave Australia when your visa ends (unless you are granted another visa).

## Family members

Family members
Details

No subsequent entrant applications can be lodged from 1 July 2024.

No subsequent entrant applications can be lodged from 1 July 2024.

## Report changes in circumstances

Report changes in circumstances
Details

Tell us if your circumstances change. This includes a new residential address, a new passport, or a pregnancy, birth or death in your family.

Tell us if your circumstances change. This includes a new residential address, a new passport, or a pregnancy, birth or death in your family.

For further information, visitChanges in your situation.

For further information, visit
